documentation:
---
#https://www.notion.so/n8n/Frontmatter-432c2b8dff1f43d4b1c8d20075510fe4
title: Telegram node documentation
description: Documentation for the Telegram node in n8n, a workflow automation platform. Includes details of operations and configuration, and links to examples and credentials information.
contentType: [integration, reference]
priority: critical
---

# Telegram node

Use the Telegram node to automate work in [Telegram](https://telegram.org/){:target=_blank .external-link} and integrate Telegram with other applications. n8n has built-in support for a wide range of Telegram features, including getting files as well as deleting and editing messages. 

On this page, you'll find a list of operations the Telegram node supports and links to more resources.

/// note | Credentials
Refer to [Telegram credentials](/integrations/builtin/credentials/telegram.md) for guidance on setting up authentication. 
///

## Operations

* [**Chat** operations](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.telegram/chat-operations.md)
    * [**Get**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.telegram/chat-operations.md#get-chat) up-to-date information about a chat.
    * [**Get Administrators**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.telegram/chat-operations.md#get-administrators): Get a list of all administrators in a chat.
    * [**Get Member**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.telegram/chat-operations.md#get-chat-member): Get the details of a chat member.
    * [**Leave**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.telegram/chat-operations.md#leave-chat) a chat.
    * [**Set Description**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.telegram/chat-operations.md#set-description) of a chat.
    * [**Set Title**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.telegram/chat-operations.md#set-title) of a chat.
* [**Callback** operations](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.telegram/callback-operations.md)
    * [**Answer Query**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.telegram/callback-operations.md#answer-query): Send answers to callback queries sent from [inline keyboards](https://core.telegram.org/bots/features#inline-keyboards){:target=_blank .external-link}.
    * [**Answer Inline Query**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.telegram/callback-operations.md#answer-inline-query): Send answers to callback queries sent from inline queries.
* [**File** operations](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.telegram/file-operations.md)
    * [**Get File**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.telegram/file-operations.md#get-file) from Telegram.
* [**Message** operations](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.telegram/message-operations.md)
    * [**Delete Chat Message**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.telegram/message-operations.md#delete-chat-message).
    * [**Edit Message Text**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.telegram/message-operations.md#edit-message-text): Edit the text of an existing message.
    * [**Pin Chat Message**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.telegram/message-operations.md#pin-chat-message) for the chat.
    * [**Send Animation**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.telegram/message-operations.md#send-animation) to the chat.
        * For use with GIFs or H.264/MPEG-4 AVC videos without sound up to 50 MB in size.
    * [**Send Audio**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.telegram/message-operations.md#send-audio) file to the chat and display it in the music player.
    * [**Send Chat Action**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.telegram/message-operations.md#send-chat-action): Tell the user that something is happening on the bot's side. The status is set for 5 seconds or less.
    * [**Send Document**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.telegram/message-operations.md#send-document) to the chat.
    * [**Send Location**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.telegram/message-operations.md#send-location): Send a geolocation to the chat.
    * [**Send Media Group**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.telegram/message-operations.md#send-media-group): Send a group of photos and/or videos.
    * [**Send Message**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.telegram/message-operations.md#send-message) to the chat.
    * [**Send Photo**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.telegram/message-operations.md#send-photo) to the chat.
    * [**Send Sticker**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.telegram/message-operations.md#send-sticker) to the chat.
        * For use with static .WEBP, animated .TGS, or video .WEBM stickers.
    * [**Send Video**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.telegram/message-operations.md#send-video) to the chat.
    * [**Unpin Chat Message**](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.telegram/message-operations.md#unpin-chat-message) from the chat.
    
    /// note | Add bot to channel
    To use most of the **Message** operations, you must add your bot to a channel so that it can send messages to that channel. Refer to [Common Issues | Add a bot to a Telegram channel](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.telegram/common-issues.md#add-a-bot-to-a-telegram-channel) for more information.
    ///

    ## Templates and examples

<!-- see https://www.notion.so/n8n/Pull-in-templates-for-the-integrations-pages-37c716837b804d30a33b47475f6e3780 -->
[[ templatesWidget(page.title, 'telegram') ]]

## Related resources

Refer to [Telegram's API documentation](https://core.telegram.org/bots/api){:target=_blank .external-link} for more information about the service.

n8n provides a trigger node for Telegram. Refer to the trigger node docs [here](/integrations/builtin/trigger-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.telegramtrigger/index.md) for more information.

## Common issues

For common errors or issues and suggested resolution steps, refer to [Common Issues](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.telegram/common-issues.md).

properties_schema.name: chatId
properties_schema.description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username, To find your chat ID ask @get_id_bot

properties_schema.description: Unique identifier of the message to delete

properties_schema.description: Unique identifier of the message to pin or unpin

options.name: disable_notification
options.description: Whether to send a notification to all chat members about the new pinned message

properties_schema.name: userId
properties_schema.description: Unique identifier of the target user

properties_schema.name: description
properties_schema.description: New chat description, 0-255 characters

properties_schema.name: title
properties_schema.description: New chat title, 1-255 characters

properties_schema.name: queryId
properties_schema.description: Unique identifier for the query to be answered

options.name: cache_time
options.description: The maximum amount of time in seconds that the result of the callback query may be cached client-side

options.name: show_alert
options.description: Whether an alert will be shown by the client instead of a notification at the top of the chat screen

options.name: text
options.description: Text of the notification. If not specified, nothing will be shown to the user, 0-200 characters.

options.name: url
options.description: URL that will be opened by the user's client

properties_schema.name: chatId
properties_schema.description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username, To find your chat ID ask @get_id_bot

properties_schema.name: binaryData
properties_schema.description: Whether the data to upload should be taken from binary field

properties_schema.name: binaryPropertyName
properties_schema.description: Name of the binary property that contains the data to upload

properties_schema.description: Unique identifier of the message to edit

properties_schema.description: Unique identifier of the inline message to edit

properties_schema.name: replyMarkup
properties_schema.description: Additional interface options

properties_schema.name: file
properties_schema.description: Animation to send. Pass a file_id to send an animation that exists on the Telegram servers (recommended), an HTTP URL for Telegram to get an animation from the Internet.

properties_schema.name: file
properties_schema.description: Audio file to send. Pass a file_id to send a file that exists on the Telegram servers (recommended), an HTTP URL for Telegram to get a file from the Internet.

properties_schema.name: action
properties_schema.description: Type of action to broadcast. Choose one, depending on what the user is about to receive. The status is set for 5 seconds or less (when a message arrives from your bot).

properties_schema.name: file
properties_schema.description: Document to send. Pass a file_id to send a file that exists on the Telegram servers (recommended), an HTTP URL for Telegram to get a file from the Internet.

properties_schema.name: latitude
properties_schema.description: Location latitude

properties_schema.name: longitude
properties_schema.description: Location longitude

properties_schema.name: media
properties_schema.description: The media to add

values.name: type
values.description: The type of the media to add

values.name: media
values.description: Media to send. Pass a file_id to send a file that exists on the Telegram servers (recommended) or pass an HTTP URL for Telegram to get a file from the Internet.

options.name: caption
options.description: Caption text to set, 0-1024 characters

options.name: parse_mode
options.description: How to parse the text

properties_schema.name: text
properties_schema.description: Text of the message to be sent

properties_schema.name: file
properties_schema.description: Photo to send. Pass a file_id to send a photo that exists on the Telegram servers (recommended), an HTTP URL for Telegram to get a photo from the Internet.

properties_schema.name: file
properties_schema.description: Sticker to send. Pass a file_id to send a file that exists on the Telegram servers (recommended), an HTTP URL for Telegram to get a .webp file from the Internet.

properties_schema.name: file
properties_schema.description: Video file to send. Pass a file_id to send a file that exists on the Telegram servers (recommended), an HTTP URL for Telegram to get a file from the Internet.

properties_schema.name: replyMarkup
properties_schema.description: Additional interface options

options.name: force_reply
options.description: Whether to show reply interface to the user, as if they manually selected the bot‘s message and tapped ’Reply

options.name: selective
options.description: Whether to force reply from specific users only

properties_schema.name: inlineKeyboard
properties_schema.description: Adds an inline keyboard that appears right next to the message it belongs to

values.name: row
values.description: The value to set

values.name: text
values.description: Label text on the button

options.name: callback_data
options.description: Data to be sent in a callback query to the bot when button is pressed, 1-64 bytes

options.name: pay
options.description: Whether to send a Pay button

options.name: switch_inline_query_current_chat
options.description: If set, pressing the button will insert the bot‘s username and the specified inline query in the current chat's input field.Can be empty, in which case only the bot’s username will be inserted

options.name: switch_inline_query
options.description: If set, pressing the button will prompt the user to select one of their chats, open that chat and insert the bot‘s username and the specified inline query in the input field. Can be empty, in which case just the bot’s username will be inserted.

options.name: url
options.description: HTTP or tg:// URL to be opened when button is pressed

options.name: web_app
url
options.description: An HTTPS URL of a Web App to be opened
Launch the Telegram Web App

properties_schema.name: replyKeyboard
properties_schema.description: Adds a custom keyboard with reply options

values.name: row
values.description: The value to set

values.name: text
values.description: Text of the button. If none of the optional fields are used, it will be sent as a message when the button is pressed.

options.name: request_contact
options.description: Whether the user's phone number will be sent as a contact when the button is pressed.Available in private chats only

options.name: request_location
options.description: Whether the user's request_location

options.name: web_app
url
options.description: An HTTPS URL of a Web App to be opened
Launch the Telegram Web App

options.name: resize_keyboard
options.description: Whether to request clients to resize the keyboard vertically for optimal fit

options.name: one_time_keyboard
options.description: Whether to request clients to hide the keyboard as soon as it's been used

options.name: selective
options.description: Whether to show the keyboard to specific users only

options.name: remove_keyboard
options.description: Whether to request clients to remove the custom keyboard

options.name: selective
options.description: Whether to force reply from specific users only

options.name: appendAttribution
options.description: Whether to include the phrase “This message was sent automatically with n8n” to the end of the message

options.name: caption
options.description: Caption text to set, 0-1024 characters

options.name: disable_notification
options.description: Whether to send the message silently. Users will receive a notification with no sound.

options.name: disable_web_page_preview
options.description: Whether to disable link previews for links in this message

options.name: duration
options.description: Duration of clip in seconds

options.name: height
options.description: Height of the video

options.name: parse_mode
options.description: How to parse the text

options.name: performer
options.description: Name of the performer

options.name: reply_to_message_id
options.description: If the message is a reply, ID of the original message

options.name: message_thread_id
options.description: The unique identifier of the forum topic

options.name: title
options.description: Title of the track

options.name: thumb
options.description: Thumbnail of the file sent; can be ignored if thumbnail generation for the file is supported server-side. The thumbnail should be in JPEG format and less than 200 kB in size. A thumbnail‘s width and height should not exceed 320.

options.name: width
options.description: Width of the video

properties_schema.name: chatId
properties_schema.description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername). To find your chat ID ask @get_id_bot.

options.name: Approval
options.description: User can approve/disapprove from within the message

options.name: Free Text
options.description: User can submit a response via a form

options.description: User can submit a response via a custom form

values.name: fieldLabel
values.description: Label that appears above the input field

values.name: fieldType
values.description: The type of field to add to the form

values.name: elementName
values.description: Optional field. It can be used to include the html in the output.

values.name: placeholder
values.description: Sample text to display inside the field

values.name: fieldName
values.description: The name of the field, used in input attributes and referenced by the workflow

values.name: fieldValue
values.description: Input value can be set here or will be passed as a query parameter via Field Name if no value is set

values.name: fieldOptions
values.description: List of options that can be selected from the dropdown

values.name: multiselect
values.description: Whether to allow the user to select multiple options from the dropdown list

values.name: html
values.description: HTML elements to display on the form page

values.name: multipleFiles
values.description: Whether to allow the user to select multiple files from the file input or just one

values.name: acceptFileTypes
values.description: Comma-separated list of allowed file extensions
values.hint: Leave empty to allow all file types

values.displayName: The displayed date is formatted based on the locale of the user's browser
values.name: formatDate
requiredField
values.description: Whether to require the user to enter a value for this field before submitting the form

options.description: Override default styling of the response form with CSS
